attributes.action: give police the powers to confiscate and crush the illegal use of Off Road Trial Bikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mary's Law
That any person found riding an off road trials bike on public highways, footpaths,bridleways country parks without either road tax, insurance or road legal silencer or cause a public nuisance or disturbance have their bikes confiscated on site,removed and crushed and are served with a lengthy ASBO.
